title: Chicken, leek and wild mushroom parcels with a chicory and radish salad
description: These light, crisp filo pies are perfect for a dinner party as they can be prepared ahead and cooked at the last minute.
ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless corn-fed chicken breasts (about 180g/6¼oz each), cut into 2cm/¾in cubes
2 lemons, 1 for zest and juice only, 1 whole
1 small, young leek, green part only, cut in half lengthways and sliced
2 x 270g packs fresh readymade filo pastry
2 large heads chicory, halved lengthways and leaves separated
1 tbsp Chardonnay vinegar (alternatively use white wine vinegar)
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
